Similarly for EJBDoclet

Can you describe your scenario please.

1) Have you setup XDoclet server runtime at preferences?
2) Did you create the servlet, ejb with the wizard?

This indicates that xdoclet ant scripts cannot find the jars at XDOCLETHOME. 
That is all.  I think you did not setup your workbench properly.  Try the new
tutorial.
